pkgmetadata.longdescription: SpaceFM is a file manager with built-in VFS, optional udisks-based device manager, customizable menu system, and bash integration. SpaceFM is a fork of legacy PCManFM. Earlier versions of this program were released under the name PCManFM-Mod.
